guid.comments: string. guid, unique only within the mod. Will be turned into GUID 'mod:'+$yourModId+':'+$guid
name: Hostages
name.comments: string. Name to be displayed in the scenario configuration options screen
description: Local villagers told you that monsters have taken their friends hostage at the Bazaar and fortified themselves. You must liberate them from all surrounding enemies.
description.comments: string. Mod description to be displayed in the scenario configuration options screen
iconSprite.comments: string. name of local file (local to the mod folder). PNG, 256x256. Shown in battle and location enemy lists.
winConditions: Defeat all the Rampaging Enemies around the Bazaar.
Defeat all the Enemies in Kraks around the Bazaar.
specialRules: Villagers gave you a precious Relic and crystals and will supply you with White Crystal every round.
One of them knows the way and will accompany you.
The longer you wait, the worse your reputation becomes.
specialRules.comments: List<string>. Special scenario rules description (not localized)
shouldCompleteAtEndOfTurn.comments: bool [default=True]. False if the scenario will be ended as soon as conditions are completed instead of waiting for end of turn.
scoreCategories.comments: List<ScoreCategory::GUID>. List of categories contributing to scenario score.

script.fileName.comments: string. Name of the script file in the same folder as the mods.json. The extension matters, use one of the supported extension (ex: '.lua')
